Astro: A modern static site builder and progressive web framework that ships zero JavaScript by default and supports interactive islands.
Eleventy: A static site generator that works with multiple template languages and doesn't require a JavaScript framework.
JavaScript: The programming language of the web.
Netlify: A hosting platform for the JAMstack.
PHP: A popular general-purpose scripting language, commonly used for content management systems.
ProcessWire: An open source content management system written in PHP.
